::Hell Drak/Necromancer::

   Hell Drak and Necromancer ran towards where they saw IR head.  Hell Drak
fired 3 rapid shots from her plasma rifle while at it.
----- Original Message -----
From: "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, June 30, 2001 4:16 AM
Subject: IR


>
> * There was no way anyone could know exactly where she was in the
> holoroom...unless they saw her right out and plain.
> But that was hard to do...when she was up in the roof.
> In a smaller form of her SBM, one where she had to travel on 4 legs
instead
> of two. It was easy going.
> But just to give a teaser to anyone that might be near...she peeked out
and
> looked around.
> Clear.
> Slipping from the roof she skittered down onto the floor and down the hall
a
> bit. Coming close to a large door with huge red letters that spelled:
> RADIOACTIVE!*
